{"id":931037355,"question_id":2721,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681096544,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/931037355/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum of Distances","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public long[] distance(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        long[] res = new long[len];\n        \n        \n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n             map.put(nums[i], map.getOrDefault(nums[i], 0)+1);\n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            \n            for(int j=i+1; j<len; j++){\n                \n                if(map.get(nums[i])==1)\n                    break;\n                \n                if(nums[i]==nums[j]){\n                    \n                    int abs = Math.abs(i-j);\n                    \n                    res[i] += abs;\n                    res[j] += abs;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-of-distances","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
